body_html: Just wanted to ping here and mention that I'm indeed working on a GPU prefetching optimization that should help parallelize loading of batches much more and hence improve performance. The work is nearly done - I'm just testing and making sure it functions correctly before publishing some instructions as to how to use it. Please stay tuned for a week or so as I solidify this more. Thanks!
